Comment: It has been estimated that American businesses spend between $2 Trillion and $3 Trillion per year to comply with federal regulations. These staggering compliance costs are ultimately borne by American households in the form of higher prices for products and services, lost jobs, and slower economic growth.
Author: Sure-Wishbone-4293

Comment: Now slash regulations on new home construction. Want an affordable house? Take out the regulations that are keeping builders from making progress.
